snippet.title: ALASKA - RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
ALASKA IS OUT NOW ON GAMEJOLT!!

https://gamejolt.com/games/alaska/267915

Alaska is a first person thriller following the life of Blake, a recent divorcee who has shut himself away in his Alaskan home for a few weeks. We begin Blake's journey on the day he decides to get out of the house. On advice from the local mailman Blake visits his neighbours to get back into the daily life of Alaska. The days following are filled with fishing, hunting and skating on frozen lakes, before Blake knows it, he's smiling again, but that all changes when a body is discovered on the town's airstrip. Now the days are filled with dread as Blake tries to figure out who the killer is before more of his friends and neighbours are murdered.


Moonlight Sonata, Op. 27 No. 2 - I. Adagio Sostenuto - Paul Pitman
